input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: MUNICIPAL ADMINISTRATION BOTTMINGEN. Summary: Common Official Publication Organ. Description: The municipalities of Bottmingen, Ettingen, Oberwil and Therwil carry out joint procurement. The municipality of Bottmingen carries out the procedure (real representation). The contract is concluded between the four communities mentioned on the one hand and the contractor on the other hand. TenderAnd the object of the contract is the manufacture and distribution of a joint official scoreboard for the municipalities of Bottmingen, Ettingen, Oberwil and Therwil in the form of a free week newspaper. The previous medium is the Birsigtal-Bote. Every week the Anzeiger reports reliably and comprehensivelyAbout political, social, cultural, commercial and sporty life in the region. The indicator essentially includes the official communications divided according to the municipality, each weekly editorial contribution per community, further community -specific information,a common Leimental part, content in the "Sport" and "Social Affairs/Society" section and other sections as well as advertisements. The indicator appears printed weekly to the approximately 15,000 households (2024: 16 378 households) of the communities involved. Also the subject of this order formsThe long -term archiving of these community publications and the manufacture of access to the archive of the previous provider. <br> Main CPV: 22210000 newspapers. Published Date: 2025-05-15. Closing Date: 2025-06-25. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed
